name: Tamas
appearance: Slim marsh ferryman with eel-skin gloves, reed-brown hair, and a bone charm tied at the throat in the Knotted Wives’ style.
character: Open-hearted and stubborn, holds marsh law in both hands and won’t let city boots trample it.
dreams: Win full recognition of knot-law in city courts
Build lantern stations along the Bone Bridge for safe mist travel
secrets: Left a lantern at the Bone Bridge and followed the lit path to undo a betrayal; he paid a price he won’t name
Ferries contraband medicine during green blister season
